page.title: 09A SCHOOLBOY'S DAY
page.content: In the morning I get up about 7.30. I have breakfast with my Mum,Dad and my brother.I have toast with Marmite for breakfast.I leave home for school at about 8.45 am. School starts at 9.o'clock .My favourite kind of work is writing stories.At play-time I play with my friend Philip.I have school dinners. Some of the foods are dehydrated, such as peas,but we have fresh salads,vegetables and fruit.I leave school at 3.30 pm. When I get home I usually go up in my bedroom and have a rest,but sometimes I go out and play games such as cricket, or I ride my bicycle. I have my tea at about 5.o'clock. In the evening I watch TV.My favourite programme is "V".I go to bed at about 9.o'clock.
